Content: A comprehensive lecture on 5S concept was delivered to the troops of the Security Forces â€“ Central (SF-Cen) on Tuesday (18) at SFHQ-C auditorium in line with the directives of the Commander of the Army. Mr Aruna Krishantha, Monaragala District Coordinator for National Utility Federation spoke about this 5S Concept. On the directions of the Commander Security Forces Central Major General Ruwan De Silva, 30 Officers and 150 Other Ranks of under command establishments listened to this lecture.
